response: Have you met my granddaughter? She’s very sweet.
This is all so horrible. I wonder how my daughter is doing.
Is my dad in here also?
Hey, Are you guys holding my girlfriend?
Dear. Before I forget, can you please pass a message to my son that i may not make dinner tonight?
My mother is probably the authority on Betsy since they knew each other for so long. You should talk to her
You should talk to my dad if you haven’t already.
And Brandi’s dad. Do you have him too?
You might speak with my granddaughter. She worked for Betsy.
You know who knew Betsy the longest is my mother. She must have some interesting thoughts.
Can you also tell me how is my grandmother?
Oh man. That would be hilarious if you’re holding Brandi’s grandmother. You’re not are you?
You know, if this is any help. Betsy’s head chef is my granddaughter’s boyfriend.
I will admit I have conflicted feelings about all of this, but it’s truly sad for some. While working at Betsy’s BBQ, Brandi Lynn met her boyfriend.
Did you bring in my boyfriend also?
Hmm. Have you met my girlfriend? She’s as smart as a whip.
You just have to wonder if this is just karma for what Betsy did to my granddaughter.
Man. Poor Brandi must have conflicted feelings after what Betsy did to her
Gosh. This is just all very confusing for me. I was so mad at Betsy for what she did last week
Boy I’ll bet Brandi is feeling weird about all this, with how Betsy embarrassed her last week
It’s such a shame. None of this would have happened if Brandi Lynn hadn’t messed up our little strategy.
but If I’m being honest. This whole thing is probably all my fault
Ok <break delay="3s" /> I’m just going to trust you and tell you this. I think all of this is my grandmother‘s fault
It’s weird. I keep getting this feeling that this all somehow relates to Betsy’s secret recipe.
Oh I just had a thought. From what I’ve heard, I’ll bet that Tucker is thrilled with all of this.
Here’s another thought. if I were a betting man, I’d wager that Tucker is pretty happy about all of this.
Oh, before I forget to tell you this. Don’t jump to conclusions that Tucker killed her. He’s got too good of a heart to commit murder just for some insurance money
and just so we get this out of the way. Yes, I am a beneficiary on the restaurant’s insurance.
How much longer will this go? I swear, even in death that rotten lady has found a way to ruin my day with these horrible interrogations. That woman hated me so
You know what else I just realized. This ends a 50 year feud for my mom and Betsy. More than any other 2 people i’ve met in my life, those two ladies hated each other something fierce
You know, this is probably going to sound wrong. But I’m relieved by the feud between my grandmother and Betsy ending
You know who’s probably finding a way to be happy about this is Constance. That lady hated Betsy.
